findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint an unlimited number of tokens by calling the _IKOMP#mint()_ function.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade due to IKOMP#delegateBySig() function not verifying nonce and expiry values
findings.description: The IKOMP#delegateBySig() function does not verify nonce and expiry values, allowing a different address to delegate voting rights as if it was the actual signer.
